meanings.definition: A set of clothes worn together, especially for a particular occasion or purpose.
meanings.sent1: For the wedding, she picked out a beautiful outfit with a white dress and matching shoes.
meanings.sent2: She wore her favorite outfit to the party last night.
meanings.sent3: The outfit she chose for the beach was so colorful and fun.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was like a rainbow, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The outfit she wore to the interview made a great impression.

meanings.definition: A group of people working together as a team or organization.
meanings.sent1: The rescue outfit quickly responded to the emergency call.
meanings.sent2: The medical outfit provided aid to those in need during the crisis.
meanings.sent3: The outfit of volunteers worked tirelessly to clean up the park.
meanings.sent4: The outfit of firefighters bravely battled the raging flames.
meanings.sent5: The outfit of chefs prepared a delicious feast for the event.
